An inline Bash script runner, for Python.
-----------------------------------------

Example Usage
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: pycon

   >>> import bash

   >>> bash.run("echo hi")
   <BashProcess pid=24108 return_code=0>

   >>> proc = _
   >>> proc.output
   'hi\n'

   >>> proc.return_code
   0

Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: shell

   $ pipenv install bash.py
